meanings.definition: Having the quality or characteristic of being more elastic or flexible, like rubber.
meanings.sent1: The rubberier band stretched easily around the box.
meanings.sent2: The rubberier gloves allowed for better grip on the slippery surface.
meanings.sent3: The rubberier balloon bounced around the room, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her rubberier personality could adapt to any situation effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The rubberier material was so stretchy, it seemed almost magical.

meanings.definition: Comparatively more resistant to wear or damage, like rubber.
meanings.sent1: The rubberier tires lasted much longer on the rough road.
meanings.sent2: His rubberier boots protected his feet from sharp rocks on the trail.
meanings.sent3: The rubberier phone case survived a fall without a scratch.
meanings.sent4: Her rubberier resolve helped her overcome all obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The rubberier fabric was tough enough to withstand any tear or rip.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that rubs or polishes.
meanings.sent1: The rubberier cleaned the floors with great care.
meanings.sent2: The rubberier polished the silver until it gleamed.
meanings.sent3: The rubberier's job was to make the furniture shine like new.
meanings.sent4: She hired a rubberier to restore the old wooden table.
meanings.sent5: The rubberier's hands were always busy making surfaces smooth and shiny.
